content.rendered: Written for readers that are culture and lifestyle enthusiasts in the Midwest, Midwest Living features Eldorado Stone’s Ashland TundraBrick in the September/October 2015 issue. Within the “Material matters” article, the silhouette of the brick veneer displays its warmth and modern sophistication. The author notes that the textured surfaces will “inspire your inner mix master.” The feature can be found on page 26.
